alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 10 at 3:48PM MDT until October 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Generally 4 to 8 inches expected above 9,000 feet. Totals around 12 inches across the highest terrain. 4 to 8 inches expected along Highway 28 over South Pass. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West. * WHEN...From 8 AM Wednesday to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, including along Highway 28 over South Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hunters and others heading into the backcountry should prepare for wet and cold conditions. Wet snow could make for difficult travel on unpaved mountain roads, especially above 9,000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
